recipes.name: Scrambled Egg
recipes.instructions: Heat pan, beat eggs, add oil to pan, throw egg to pan, stir eggs, add seasoning, remove pan from heat, keep stirring,

recipes.name: Pizza
recipes.instructions: Roll the dough, put some sauce on it, put some cheese, pop it into the oven 250-260 degrees. Bake for 30 minutes

recipes.name: Fried Rice
recipes.instructions: Turn your skillet to medium high heat and pour oil into the bottom of your skillet and add all your ingredients. Fry this until they are tender.

recipes.name: Spaghetti
recipes.instructions: Boil water in a pot, add salt to water, throw pasta in pot when water === boiled, stir occasionally, after 5-6 minutes, drain the pasta but leave some pasta water
